Main.TextJPN: 「……午後の授業ってさ、どーしてこー眠いんだろーねぇ」
Main.TextENG: ``I wonder why afternoons always make you feel sleepy like this.``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音が、聞く者まで眠くするような声で話しかけてきた。
Main.TextENG: Mion spoke in a voice that went so far as to make whoever heard it lethargic.

Main.TextJPN: 「眠いことに医学的説明が必要かよ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10730.話してもいいが、もっと眠くなるぞ」
Main.TextENG: ``You want a medical explanation for sleepiness?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10730. I could say it, but it'll just make you more sleepy.``

Main.TextJPN: 「…ぎゃ～…堪忍して～………」
Main.TextENG: ``...Gah～ ...Spare me～...``

Main.TextJPN: もうすぐ３時。
Main.TextENG: It was almost 3 o'clock.

Main.TextJPN: ６時限目の授業ももうすぐ終わりだ。
Main.TextENG: 6th period was almost over.

Main.TextJPN: ちなみに、沙都子たち低学年は５時限目で解放されているので、今頃は校庭ではしゃぎ合っているだろう。
Main.TextENG: By the way, Satoko and everyone else in the lower grades ended their school day after 5th period, so they were probably running around in the schoolyard right now.

Main.TextJPN: 校庭から聞こえてくる子供たちの楽しそうな声が、実にうらやましい。
Main.TextENG: I could hear their joy-filled voices coming from there right now. Oh, what I would give to be able to join them.

Main.TextJPN: 「ほら、魅ぃちゃんは委員長さんなんだからもっと頑張らないと。@k@vS19/02/990200447.寝ちゃだめだよ～」
Main.TextENG: ``Mii-chan, you're the class representative, so you have to try harder.@k@vS19/02/990200447. No going to sleep～.``

Main.TextJPN: 「私さー、クラス委員長じゃなくて、水泳部の部長がいいんだよ。@k@vS19/03/990300491.いっぱい寝れるからー」
Main.TextENG: ``You see, rather than the class representative, I'd rather be the president of the boxing club.@k@vS19/03/990300491. They get to sleep a lot.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ほー？　…してその心は？」
Main.TextENG: ``Huh? ...What makes you think that?``

Main.TextJPN: 「水泳部なだけにスイミン・グ～、なんちゃって～…」
Main.TextENG: ``At the boxing gym they're always hitting the sack. Get it?``

Main.TextJPN: ゴン！
Main.TextENG: BAM!

Main.TextJPN: 先生がけらけらと笑いながら、教科書の角で魅音の後頭部を叩く。
Main.TextENG: The teacher cackled as she hit the back of Mion's head with the corner of a textbook.

Main.TextJPN: 「…お後がよろしいようで。@k@vS19/22/991400002.今日はこれくらいにしましょう。@k@vS19/22/991400003.委員長、号令」
Main.TextENG: ``...That's all from me.@k@vS19/22/991400002. I'll leave it at that for today.@k@vS19/22/991400003. Representative, please direct the class.``

Main.TextJPN: 「きりーーーーつ！@k@vS19/03/990300494.　きょーつけーーーー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Everybody stand up!@k@vS19/03/990300494. At attention!!``

Main.TextJPN: さっきまで半分寝ていたはずの魅音が、授業が終わると聞いた途端に元気を取り戻す。
Main.TextENG: Mion, who had been half-asleep, became lively again the moment she heard class was over.

Main.TextJPN: …ここまで現金だと、見ていて痛快かもしれない。
Main.TextENG: ...It must be delightful to be that shrewd.

Main.TextJPN: ホームルームは、低学年の最後の授業が終わった時に済ませているため、最後の授業が終わると、そのまま流れ解散になる。
Main.TextENG: Homeroom was done after the lower grades had finished their lessons, so we were free to go.

Main.TextJPN: 異なる学年が混在する我が校ならではの変則技だ。
Main.TextENG: It was one of the odd rules we had as a mixed-grade school.

Main.TextJPN: 授業が終わったことがわかると、沙都子と梨花ちゃんが教室に戻ってきた。
Main.TextENG: When they knew class was over, Satoko and Rika-chan returned to the classroom.

Main.TextJPN: 「……お疲れさまなのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...Good work today.``

Main.TextJPN: 「さー！！　楽しい部活の時間ですのよー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``All right!! It's time for happy fun club activities!!``
``Yeah!@k@vS19/03/990300496. That's right.@k@vS19/03/990300497. What should we do today?``

Main.TextJPN: 「ねぇ魅ぃちゃん。@k@vS19/02/990200449.今日は昨日のイベントの続きにはならないの？」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey, Mii-chan.@k@vS19/02/990200449. Why don't we continue what we started yesterday?``

Main.TextJPN: 「そうそう！@k@vS19/04/990400220.　そうですわ！@k@vS19/04/990400221.　あれだけ大盛り上がりして尻切れトンボでは、納得が行きませんのよー！」
Main.TextENG: ``Yes!@k@vS19/04/990400220. We should do that!@k@vS19/04/990400221. To have it end like that when things were getting good, I won't accept it!``

Main.TextJPN: 「まぁまぁ。@k@vS19/03/990300499.気持ちはわかるけど、またの機会にしようよ！@k@vS19/03/990300500.　放課後の教室なんてしみったれたロケーションじゃなくて…もっと晴れの舞台でさ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Now now.@k@vS19/03/990300499. I know how you feel, but let's save that for another time!@k@vS19/03/990300500. Something like that shouldn't be done somewhere dinky like a classroom after school, but a grander stage!``

Main.TextJPN: 「俺はいつでもいいけどなー。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10760.決勝戦は後輩たちも立ち会わせる約束になってるんだ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10770.予め日取りを決めてほしいぜ」
Main.TextENG: ``I'm down whenever.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10760. But some of the younger guys said they'd watch me in the finals.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10770. So let me know ahead of time.``

Main.TextJPN: 「わー！@k@vS19/02/990200451.　圭一くんすごい！@k@vS19/02/990200452.　応援してくれる人がいるんだね！　いるんだね！@k@vS19/02/990200453.　……レナにも応援してくれる人、いないかな」
Main.TextENG: ``Whoa!@k@vS19/02/990200451. Keiichi-kun, you're amazing!@k@vS19/02/990200452. There's people cheering you on! Cheering you on!@k@vS19/02/990200453. ...I wonder if there's anybody cheering on Rena...``

Main.TextJPN: レナがちょっぴり夢見る乙女モードになったのを見逃さない。
Main.TextENG: I couldn't help but watch as Rena entered her Pining Maiden Mode.

Main.TextJPN: 「手は抜けないけど、…レナの優勝、俺が祈ってるぜ」
Main.TextENG: ``I'm not gonna pull any punches, but I'll pray for your victory, Rena.``

Main.TextJPN: 甘味料のように甘～い圭一スマイルで、レナの頭をわしわしと乱暴に撫でてやる。
Main.TextENG: With a saccharine Keiichi-brand smile, I ruffled Rena's hair roughly.

Main.TextJPN: レナは真っ赤になってショートし、両耳からブスブスと煙を噴き出している。
Main.TextENG: Rena turned bright red and short-circuited, smoke billowing from both her ears.

Main.TextJPN: 瞳を覗き込むと、ナゾのお花畑で俺と手をつないでスキップしているレナが映っていた…。
Main.TextENG: Gazing into her eyes, a strange scene of me holding hands with Rena and skipping through a flowerbed was reflected there...

Main.TextJPN: ……あぁ…たとえ他人の想像の中だとしてもすごく嫌だ……。
Main.TextENG: ...Ahh... even if it was in somebody else's imagination, it was terribly troubling...

Main.TextJPN: 「……レナ殺しの圭一なのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...Meet Keiichi, the Rena-killer.``

Main.TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんがそう言うと、みんなも一斉に笑い出す。
Main.TextENG: When Rika-chan said that, everyone burst out laughing at once.

Main.TextJPN: 「あははは！@k@vS19/03/990300502.　でもそのレナは沙都子や梨花ちゃんキラーなわけでしょ」
Main.TextENG: ``Ahahaha!@k@vS19/03/990300502. That Rena is a Satoko and Rika-chan killer, though!``

Main.TextJPN: 「確かにレナさんには勝てないかもしれませんけど…、私たちは圭一さんには負けませんでしてよー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``It may be true that we can't win against Rena... but we won't lose to Keiichi!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「へー、何だか面白い相関図だな。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10800.俺たちの強さって、ジャンケンみたいに相性があるわけだ！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10810.　…でもそれ、魅音が抜けてるな」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh～ This is becoming a pretty interesting relationship map.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10800. Our strengths kind of interact like in rock-paper-scissors!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10810. ...But that doesn't include Mion, does it?``

Main.TextJPN: 「当り前でしょ。@k@vS19/03/990300504.私、相性なんか関係なく、誰にでも負けないし」
Main.TextENG: ``Of course not.@k@vS19/03/990300504. It doesn't matter who it is, I won't lose.``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音が…部長の、いや帝王の眼差しでニヤリと笑う…！
Main.TextENG: Mion leered with the gaze befitting of a club president― no... befitting of an empress!

Main.TextJPN: 場の雰囲気も盛り上がってきた。@kそろそろ…始めたい頃合だぜ！
Main.TextENG: The mood in the room became more lively.@k It was as good a moment as any to get started!

Main.TextJPN: 「さぁて！@k@vS19/03/990300506.　ボチボチ始めようかね！」
Main.TextENG: ``Well now!@k@vS19/03/990300506. Let's get started nice and easy!``

Main.TextJPN: 「うん！@k@vS19/02/990200458.　それで魅ぃちゃん、今日は何をやるのかな？　かな？」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah!@k@vS19/02/990200458. So then Mii-chan, what shall we do today? Today?``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音は、う～んと軽く唸りながら、通称『部活ロッカー』の中身を漁っている。
Main.TextENG: Mion let out a small interjection as she rummaged through the so-called ``Club Locker.``

Main.TextJPN: いつ見ても…色々とごちゃごちゃ入っているよなぁ。
Main.TextENG: Every time I look... there's always a ton of things crammed in there.

Main.TextJPN: あのぎゅうぎゅうに詰まった箱類は全てゲームなわけだろ？
Main.TextENG: Everything that's jammed in that locker is a game of some kind, you know?

Main.TextJPN: しかも罰ゲーム用の猫耳やら首輪やらもしまってあるんだから…そのキャパシティーは計り知れない！
Main.TextENG: On top of that, things used for penalty games like cat-ears and collars were kept in there... the capacity of that thing is unfathomable!

Main.TextJPN: …あのロッカー、実は奥の壁をぶち抜いていて、その向こうは四次元につながっている……というのが俺の推理なんだが。
Main.TextENG: ...That locker, maybe it actually extended through the wall into the 4th dimension... that's my theory, anyways.

Main.TextJPN: そうでなければ、あぁも次から次へといろんな物が出てくることを説明できん！
Main.TextENG: If not that, then how else could you explain how someone could pull out item after item!?

Main.TextJPN: 魅音は顎に手を当てて軽く思案した後、どのゲームも取り出さずに振り返った。
Main.TextENG: After Mion touched her hand to her chin briefly in thought, she turned around without pulling out any games.

Main.TextJPN: 「今日はさ。ちょっとシンプルに行ってみようかね！@k@vS19/03/990300508.　大道具を使ったゲームばかりってのも大味でよくないでしょ」
Main.TextENG: ``Why don't we try and keep it a bit simple today?@k@vS19/03/990300508. Playing games that require lots of pieces all the time can be a little bland, right?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……どんなゲームでも、みんなでやれば大盛り上がりしますです」
Main.TextENG: ``...It doesn't matter what game it is, if everybody plays together we can have fun.``

Main.TextJPN: 「うん。そうだね。そうだね！」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah. That's right. That's right!``

Main.TextJPN: 俺もレナに相槌を打つ。@k…同感だ。
Main.TextENG: Rena and I both expressed our agreement.@k ...I feel the same way.

Main.TextJPN: このメンバーでなら、たとえ校庭の雑草むしりをしたって楽しいに違いない。
Main.TextENG: With this group, there's no doubt even if we were pulling weeds from the school grounds it would be fun.

Main.TextJPN: 「…私は楽しくないですわ。@k@vS19/04/990400224.草むしりなんか」
Main.TextENG: ``...That wouldn't be fun for me.@k@vS19/04/990400224. Pulling weeds or whatever.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、やっぱりか？@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10830.　…ってゆーか沙都子。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10840.人の表情見て、考えを読むのはやめろ」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah, that's right, isn't it?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10830. ...By the way, Satoko.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10840. Could you stop reading people's minds by looking at their expressions?``

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一くんは顔に考えてることがすぐ出るからね。@k@vS19/02/990200461.すぐわかっちゃうんだよ～」
Main.TextENG: ``Whatever you're thinking is always written all over your face.@k@vS19/02/990200461. So I always know right away～.``

Main.TextJPN: 昔からよくそう言われるが、転校してからは特にひどいようだな…。
Main.TextENG: I've always been told that, but ever since I transferred it seems like it's been especially bad...

Main.TextJPN: ポーカーフェイスを身に付けないとまずいかもしれないな…。
Main.TextENG: I need to develop a poker face or I could be in for a rough time...

Main.TextJPN: 「はーい！！　みんな傾聴傾聴～！@k@vS19/03/990300510.　ルールを説明するよ～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Alright! Everybody pay attention～!@k@vS19/03/990300510. I'm going to explain the rules～!!``

Main.TextJPN: 俺たち全員が下らない話をやめ、表情を一気に引き締める。
Main.TextENG: We all immediately cut the idle chatter and put on stern expressions.

Main.TextJPN: いつの間にか、みんな虎や鮫のような眼差しで耳を傾けている。
Main.TextENG: In no time at all, everybody's gaze focused like a tiger or a shark, listening intently.

Main.TextJPN: そう。@kルールを聞くこの段階から……勝負は始まっているのだッ！
Main.TextENG: That's right.@k From the point where the rules are explained... the match has already begun!

Main.TextJPN: 「今日のゲームは…割とパーティーゲームでは知られてるヤツなんだけどね。@k@vS19/03/990300512.『シンパシー』って言うんだけど、聞いたことある人いるー？」
Main.TextENG: ``Today's game is... probably better known as a party game.@k@vS19/03/990300512. It's called 'Sympathy.' Has anybody heard of it before?``

Main.TextJPN: …シンパシー。
Main.TextENG: ...Sympathy.

Main.TextJPN: 共感するって意味だよな。@k…あれ、俺、知ってるかも…？
Main.TextENG: It means to share someone's feelings, right?@k ...Huh? Maybe I might know this...

Main.TextJPN: 「魅ぃちゃん、それひょっとして…。@k@vS19/02/990200463.お題目を決めて、みんなで連想する言葉を書いて…@k@vS19/02/990200464.同じ答えを書いた人が多ければ多いほど得点、っていうゲームかな？」
Main.TextENG: ``Mii-chan, maybe it's...@k@vS19/02/990200463. The game where we choose a topic, and everybody writes down the first word that comes to mind...@k@vS19/02/990200464. And the more people who share the same answers, the more points are awarded?``

Main.TextJPN: 「だったらレナ、知ってるよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``In that case, Rena knows about it!``

Main.TextJPN: あぁ…思い出した！
Main.TextENG: Ahh... I remember!

Main.TextJPN: 小学校の時、遠足のバスの中でそんなゲームをやったよな！
Main.TextENG: I recall playing a game like that in grade school while we were on the bus during a field trip!

Main.TextJPN: 「知らないゲームでしてよ。@k@vS19/04/990400226.説明してほしいですわね」
Main.TextENG: ``I'm not familiar with this game.@k@vS19/04/990400226. I would like an explanation.``

Main.TextJPN: 「まずね、親が『お題目』を決めるんだよ。@k@vS19/03/990300514.たとえば……『デザート』って言うお題目を決めたとする」
Main.TextENG: ``First of all, we have the leader choose a topic.@k@vS19/03/990300514. For example... if they choose 'dessert.'``

Main.TextJPN: 「うふふふ！@k@vS19/03/990300516.　沙都子はデザートって言われたら、真っ先に何を思いつくかな？」
Main.TextENG: ``Hehehe!@k@vS19/03/990300516.　 Satoko-chan, when somebody says 'dessert,' what's the first thing you think of?``

Main.TextJPN: 「……えっとー…そうですわね。@k@vS19/04/990400228.たとえば『プリン』とか」
Main.TextENG: ``...Ummm. ...Let's see here...@k@vS19/04/990400228. 'Pudding' or something.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ＯＫ！　だったら沙都子は手元のメモに『プリン』って書くわけ。@k@vS19/03/990300518.で、全員で『いっせーのせ！』で答えを公開し合う。@k@vS19/03/990300519.で、プリンって書いた人が２人以上いれば得点！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ok! In that case, Satoko, you would write down 'pudding' on your memo pad.@k@vS19/03/990300518. Then, everybody reveals their answer at the same time.@k@vS19/03/990300519. If there's two or more people who wrote down 'pudding,' they get points!

Main.TextJPN: 「いればいるほど高得点だから…全員が同じ答えだったら、最大５点入るわけ！」
Main.TextENG: The more people who write down the same answer, the more points are awarded. So if everybody writes down the same answer, that's a max of 5 points!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……つまり、みんなと同じ答えになるように考えるのがコツなのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...In other words, the trick is to think so that what you write down is the same answer as everybody else.``

Main.TextJPN: まさに梨花ちゃんの言う通り。
Main.TextENG: It was exactly as Rika-chan said.

Main.TextJPN: このゲームで大事なのは、この『みんなと同じ答えになるように』考える点だ。
Main.TextENG: The point of this game was to think in a way so that you have the same answer as everybody else.

Main.TextJPN: たとえば…自分はデザートと言われて真っ先に『イチゴ汁粉！』と思いついたとしても。@k…他のみんなと一致しない答えでは得点できないわけだ。
Main.TextENG: For example... even if you heard the word 'dessert' and immediately thought of 'strawberry sundae'...@k ...If your answer doesn't match up with everybody else you don't get any points.

Main.TextJPN: だから、ぐっとそれを我慢して、みんなの答えそうな答えに変更しなくてはならない…。
Main.TextENG: That's why you have to hold off on that answer, and change to one that seems like one everybody else will choose...

Main.TextJPN: 自分の考えでなく、他の仲間の答えをどこまで読めるかがカギになる、高度な知能ゲームなのだ！！
Main.TextENG: The key becomes not what you think yourself, but being able to predict what everybody else will answer. It's a very high-level intellectual game!!

Main.TextJPN: 「……魅ぃ、沙都子のために１回だけ練習をしてみましょうです」
Main.TextENG: ``...Mii, for Satoko's sake, let's try practicing for one round.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ＯＫ～。親は部長である私でいいよね。@k@vS19/03/990300522.お題目を何か適当に……」
Main.TextENG: ``OK～. For this round, seeing as I'm club president, the leader will be me, alright?@k@vS19/03/990300522. The topic can be something random...``

Main.TextJPN: 国語の教科書を取り出し、ランダムにページをめくり始める。
Main.TextENG: Taking out her literature textbook, she began flipping to a random page.

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃあ…１回だけ練習戦ね！」
Main.TextENG: ``Alright then... this is the only practice round!``

Main.TextJPN: 「………最初のお題目は～、『かき氷』ッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...The first topic is... 'Shaved Ice'!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「あははは！@k@vS19/03/990300526.　かき氷って言ったら…決まってるよね～！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ahahaha!@k@vS19/03/990300526. When you say 'shaved ice'... there's only one answer, isn't there～!``

Main.TextJPN: かき氷のスタンダードって言ったら、イチゴ、メロン、ブルーハワイだよなぁ！
Main.TextENG: Among the standard flavors of shaved ice, there's strawberry, melon, and Blue Hawaii.

Main.TextJPN: 中でも人気は…メロンに決まってるだろ！
Main.TextENG: The most popular amongst those... is obviously melon!

Main.TextJPN: 「みんな書いたー？@k@vS19/03/990300528.　じゃあ一斉に公開するよ？@k@vS19/03/990300529.　いっせーのぉ、せッ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Everyone wrote down an answer?@k@vS19/03/990300528. Then everybody show theirs at the same time, okay?@k@vS19/03/990300529. Ready... go!``

Main.TextJPN: 「イチゴ」@r@t「メロン」@r@t「宇治金時」@r@t「イチゴ」@r@t「イチゴ」
Main.TextENG: ``Strawberry.``@r@t ``Melon.``@r@t ``Ujigintoki.``@r@t ``Strawberry.``@r@t ``Strawberry.``

Main.TextJPN: ありゃあぁッ？！？！　メロンが…俺しかいない？！
Main.TextENG: Wha―!?!? I'm the only one.. with melon!?

Main.TextJPN: 「お、お前ら…！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10860.　イチゴなんてスッタンダードなつまんねーの選ぶなよなぁ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Y-You guys...!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10860. Don't go doing something so mundane as picking strawberry as the standard!

Main.TextJPN: 「おいレナ、かき氷でイチゴなんか頼むかよ？！　夏祭りで一番早く売り切れるのはメロンって決まってるんだぜ？！？！」
Main.TextENG: Hey Rena, would you actually order strawberry shaved ice!? The first thing that always sells out at summer festivals is always melon, isn't it!?!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「レナもメロン味は好きだよ！@k@vS19/02/990200468.　でもやっぱり…イチゴ味だよね。よね☆」
Main.TextENG: ``Rena also likes melon flavor!@k@vS19/02/990200468. But really... it's all about the strawberry, right? Right☆!``

Main.TextJPN: 「圭ちゃん、確かに私も選ぶならメロンにするよ。@k@vS19/03/990300532.だけどね、これは連想ゲームだよぅ？@k@vS19/03/990300533.　かき氷って言ったらまず筆頭はイチゴでしょ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Kei-chan, if I was to pick, I would actually choose melon.@k@vS19/03/990300532. But you see, this is a word association game.@k@vS19/03/990300533. If somebody says shaved ice the first thing you think of is strawberry!``

Main.TextJPN: 釈然としないが……まぁとにかく！　こういうゲームなのだ！！
Main.TextENG: I'm still not entirely convinced... but in any case! It's this type of game!!

Main.TextJPN: 「…り、梨花のは何て書いてありますの…？@k@vS19/04/990400231.　それ、かき氷ですの？？」
Main.TextENG: ``R-Rika, what exactly did you write?@k@vS19/04/990400231. Is that a type of shaved ice??``

Main.TextJPN: 「……宇治金時です。@k@vS19/05/990500110.たまらないおいしさなのですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...It's ujigintoki.@k@vS19/05/990500110. It's incredibly delicious, you know.``

Main.TextJPN: まぁ確かにうまいとは思うが…ちょっと一般的じゃないぞ。@k…いやしかし……チョイスが渋い…。
Main.TextENG: Well, it might be delicious, sure... but it's not exactly run-of-the-mill.@k ..Still... that's a pretty refined choice...

Main.TextJPN: 「沙都子、これでだいたい分かったかな？@k@vS19/03/990300535.　イチゴって書いた人は、仲間が３人いるから３点獲得！@k@vS19/03/990300536.　この調子で点を競っていくわけ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Satoko, did this help you get a good idea?@k@vS19/03/990300535. There were 3 people who wrote down strawberry, so those people get 3 points!@k@vS19/03/990300536. We compete to see who can get the most!``

Main.TextJPN: 「えぇえぇ！@k@vS19/04/990400233.　わかりましたわー！！@k@vS19/04/990400234.　それより魅音さん。@k@vS19/04/990400235.今日の罰ゲームは何にしますですの？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Yeah, yeah!@k@vS19/04/990400233. I've got it!!@k@vS19/04/990400234. More importantly, Mion-san.@k@vS19/04/990400235. What shall we do about today's penalty game!?``
``Hau...!@k@vS19/02/990200470. Th-There's going to be one after all...@k@vS19/02/990200471. ...What will it be? ...What will it be!``
``Hmmm...@k@vS19/03/990300538. What should it be?@k@vS19/03/990300539. ...Kei-chan, you have a suggestion?``

Main.TextJPN: 「え、罰ゲーム？？@k@vS19/01/VT0_keiichi0002.　そうだな…小学校の頃…罰ゲームってのがあったら……うん。@k@vS19/01/VT0_keiichi0003.やっぱりアレだよな」
Main.TextENG: ``Wha- for the penalty game??@k@vS19/01/VT0_keiichi0002....When I was in elementary school... there was a penalty game... yeah.@k@vS19/01/VT0_keiichi0003. It can only be 'that.'``

Main.TextJPN: 「そう、荷物持ちだ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Yes, Schlepping!``

Main.TextJPN: 「つまり、負けた人が全員の荷物を持たされて運ぶ、ってヤツでしょ。@k@vS19/03/990300541.男子がよくやってるね。@k@vS19/03/990300542.全身ランドセルだらけにして歩いてる小学生、よく見るし～！」
Main.TextENG: ``In other words, that thing where the loser has to carry around everybody else's baggage.@k@vS19/03/990300541. It happened often to the boys.@k@vS19/03/990300542. Elementary school kids walking around completely covered in backpacks, you see it a lot～!``

Main.TextJPN: 「でも……どうするの？@k@vS19/02/990200473.　沙都子ちゃんと梨花ちゃんのお家は私たちとは逆方向だよ？」
Main.TextENG: ``But... how will we do that?@k@vS19/02/990200473. Satoko-chan and Rika-chan's houses are the complete opposite direction from ours.``

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃあ…１位の荷物をビリが家まで運んであげる、でいいんじゃない？@k@vS19/03/990300544.　全員の荷物の宅配だと結構いい距離になっちゃうしね」
Main.TextENG: ``Then how about... the loser carries just the winner's stuff to their house?@k@vS19/03/990300544. Getting everybody's stuff to their house would involve covering a pretty sizable distance.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、うん。@k@vS19/02/990200475.それくらいなら…いいかもね！」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh, yeah.@k@vS19/02/990200475. Just that much... might be alright!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……何だか、今日の罰ゲームは簡単ですわねぇ。@k@vS19/04/990400237.この程度の罰ゲームでは圭一さんにやらせても面白くありませんわ～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Somehow, today's penalty game is pretty simple.@k@vS19/04/990400237. With a penalty game of this level it wouldn't even be fun to make Keiichi-san do it!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃあもうちょっとレベルアップしようかね！」
Main.TextENG: ``Then shall we raise the stakes a bit!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ただ荷物運びをするだけじゃなく……ジャーーン！」
Main.TextENG: ``Not just playing porter......Tadaa!``

Main.TextJPN: 「これを着て荷物運びをしてもらうというのはどうかなぁ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``How about we have someone schlep stuff around dressed in this!?``

Main.TextJPN: 「なぜにメイド服ーーーッ！！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Why a maid outfit of all things!?!?``
``H-Hau...!@k@vS19/02/990200477. I-It's cute and all... b-but no waaaaaaaaaaaay～!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……でもでも！@k@vS19/04/990400239.　圭一さんが負けた場合はどうしますの？！@k@vS19/04/990400240.　圭一さんに着れるサイズがなければ…、」
Main.TextENG: ``...But you see, you see!@k@vS19/04/990400239. What do we do if Keiichi-san loses?@k@vS19/04/990400240. If we don't have a size that fits him...``

Main.TextJPN: 「そこは抜かりないよ～！@k@vS19/03/990300549.　圭ちゃん用にちゃんとＸＬサイズも用意してあるもんねー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh I didn't let that little detail get by～!@k@vS19/03/990300549. I have a nice XL size one prepared juuust for Kei-chan!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「さぁ圭ちゃん、覚悟はいい？！@k@vS19/03/990300551.　メイドコスさせて外をねり歩かせてあげるよ～！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``So, Kei-chan, are you ready!?@k@vS19/03/990300551. I'm going to have you walk around outside dressed up as a maid～!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「カチューシャからそりゃもう何から何まで…ぜ～んぶ揃ってるんだからねぇ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``From the headband to the garter belt, even the underwear... I've got it aaaaall prepared for you!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ぜぜ、絶対ヘンだ！！　なんでそんなものがサイズ毎に全部ロッカーに入ってるんだよ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``T-T-This is insane!! Why do you have every possible size of that type of thing in that locker!?``

Main.TextJPN: ま、まずいぞ前原圭一…！！
Main.TextENG: Th-This is bad, Keiichi Maebara!!

Main.TextJPN: 何だか…俺に限って支払いが過酷な内容になりつつあるぞ？！
Main.TextENG: Somehow... it's become a situation where only my failure results in an overly cruel price to pay.

Main.TextJPN: 間違って俺が負けでもしたら…？！
Main.TextENG: What if I make a mistake and lose...!?

Main.TextJPN: もう日中に表は歩けないッ！！
Main.TextENG: I wouldn't be able to walk around in broad daylight anymore!!

Main.TextJPN: あら奥様、前原さんちの坊ちゃんでしてよ？@k　聞きまして？@k　何だか女装癖があるらしいんですの。
Main.TextENG: Oh, Ma'am, about that Maebara boy...@k Did you hear about him?@k It seems like he has a penchant for cross-dressing.

Main.TextJPN: あらやだ本当に？@k　恥ずかしいったらありませんわね、をーっほっほっほ！！
Main.TextENG: Oh my, really?@k That'd be so embarrassing, you know? Ooohohoho!!

Main.TextJPN: 「だーーーーッ！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10920.　そ、それは辛すぎるー！！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ngyaaaa----!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10920. Th-That's way too harsh!!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: それはあまりに…苛烈だ！！@k　正常な罰ゲームに戻すなら…今しかないはず！！！
Main.TextENG: That's just incredibly... brutal!!@k If we're to return this penalty to some semblance of normalcy, now is the only time!

Main.TextJPN: み、みんな、こんな不健全な罰ゲームはやめるんだ…！！！
Main.TextENG: E-Everybody, I think we should refrain from this unwholesome penalty game...!!!

Main.TextJPN: 何で学校の帰り道に！@k　メイド服の女の子を従えて、荷物持ちなんかさせなきゃならないんだ？！
Main.TextENG: Why on the way back home from school!?@k Do we have to be accompanied by a girl wearing a maid uniform and carrying our baggage!?

Main.TextJPN: で、ご主人様ぁって言わせて、恥ずかしいカッコのまま村中を引き回して……はぁはぁ。@k………はぁはぁって？
Main.TextENG: Having them say ``Master,`` while dragging them around the village in such an embarrassing outfit... ...*pant pant* ...Wait, why am I panting?

Main.TextJPN: …な、なんだ…。この湧き上がってくる感情は……。
Main.TextENG: ...Wh-What is this... This feeling welling up inside me...

Main.TextJPN: 「ねぇ、やっぱり普通の荷物持ちにしようよ…！@k@vS19/02/990200479.　ほら、圭一くんも固まっちゃってるし…」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey, let's just make it a normal penalty game...!@k@vS19/02/990200479. Wait, Keiichi-kun has frozen stiff...``

Main.TextJPN: バシーーンッ！！！
Main.TextENG: *FOOOOOM*!!!

Main.TextJPN: レナの双肩を俺の炎をまとった両手が力強く叩くッ！！！
Main.TextENG: Burning with passion, I firmly placed my hands on Rena's shoulders!!!

Main.TextJPN: 「レナ、罰ゲームが何かが問題じゃない。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10940.…勝てばいいのさッ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10950.　そうだろ、みんな！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Rena, there is no problem with the penalty game.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10940. ...I just have to win!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10950. That's right, everybody!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 白い歯を『キラーン！』と輝かせて、俺の爽やかな笑顔が向けられる。
Main.TextENG: I turned to everybody with an idiotic grin, my pearly whites flashing with a brilliant gleam.

Main.TextJPN: 「お、圭ちゃん、分かってきたねー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh, Kei-chan, you've come around to the idea, eh?``
``No matter what the penalty game is!! There's no reason to be afraid!!@k@vS19/03/990300555. You just have to win!!@k@vS19/03/990300556. Right, everybody!?@k@vS19/03/990300557. Yeah! Yeah!``

Main.TextJPN: 「「おぉおおーー！！！」」
Main.TextENG: ``````Yeaaaaaaaaah―!!!``````

Main.TextJPN: 魅音から梨花ちゃんまでが、全員力強く握りこぶしを突き上げる！！
Main.TextENG: From Mion to Rika, everybody energetically thrust their fists up high!!

Main.TextJPN: レナだけは踏ん切りがつかないらしく、しどろもどろとしている。
Main.TextENG: Only Rena seemed somewhat undecided, standing there looking flustered.

Main.TextJPN: …鈍いヤツだなぁ。ちゃんと勝てれば、レナにだっておいしいチャンスなのに！
Main.TextENG: ...She's a little bit slow, isn't she. If she wins, even for Rena it's quite a delectable opportunity!

Main.TextJPN: 「おいおいレナ。@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10970.これ、かなりのビッグチャンスだぜ？！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10980.　……メイド服の梨花ちゃんｏｒ沙都子をお持ち帰りできる史上最高、最強のチャンスなんだぞッ？！」
Main.TextENG: ``Hey, Rena.@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10970. Don't you see this is a pretty big opportunity!?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI10980. ...Rika-chan or Satoko-chan in a maid outfit, coming right to your doorstep. This is a historically great chance, isn't it!?``

Main.TextJPN: ぶッ！
Main.TextENG: *sploosh*

Main.TextJPN: レナが勢いよく鼻血を噴き出す。
Main.TextENG: Rena began spouting a fountain of blood from her nose.

Main.TextJPN: 瞳の色はすっかり変わり…かぁいいモードにシフトするッ！
Main.TextENG: The look in her eyes completely changed... she's shifted into Kyute Mode!

Main.TextJPN: 待ってたぜレナ！！@k　その瞳の色をよぅッ！！
Main.TextENG: I was waiting for this Rena!!@k That look in her eyes!!

Main.TextJPN: 「はぅ～～～、お持ち帰り～！！！@k@vS19/02/990200481.　別に圭一くんでも魅ぃちゃんでもいいんだよ～！　はぅ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Hau～～～, to my doorstep～!!!@k@vS19/02/990200481. It's not like Keiichi-kun or Mii-chan wouldn't be good too～! Hau!``
``Alright!!@k@vS19/03/990300560. It looks like everybody's prepared themselves!!@k@vS19/03/990300561. Get your memo pads ready!!@k@vS19/03/990300562. First question, ready!?``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音がランダムに教科書を開き、目に付いた単語を読み上げる！
Main.TextENG: Mion opened up her textbook to a random page, and read out a word that caught her eye!

Main.TextJPN: 「まず最初のお題目は……『夏休み』！！」
Main.TextENG: ``The first topic is... 'Summer Break'!!``

Main.TextJPN: これまた…抽象的なキーワードだな。
Main.TextENG: This is yet another... quite abstract keyword.

Main.TextJPN: …じゃあまずは無難に、このあたりから行くか。
Main.TextENG: ...Well then, let's not worry about it too much and start with something like this.
``Everybody good!?@k@vS19/03/990300565. Time to show 'em!@k@vS19/03/990300566. Ready, go!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音の号令に合わせ、みんなが一斉に書いたメモを掲げる。
Main.TextENG: On Mion's signal, everybody simultaneously held up what they wrote.

Main.TextJPN: どれどれ…みんなのは何だ？
Main.TextENG: Let's see, what did everybody write?

Main.TextJPN: 「夏祭り」@r@t「夏祭り」@r@t「花火」@r@t「蚊取り線香」
Main.TextENG: ``Summer Festival.``@r@t``Summer Festival.``@r@t``Fireworks.``@r@t``Mosquito Coils.``

Main.TextJPN: 「お、レナと私が同じ答えだね！@k@vS19/03/990300569.　よっしゃ、２点獲得！」
Main.TextENG: ``Oh, Rena and I have the same answer!@k@vS19/03/990300569. Alright! Two points!``

Main.TextJPN: 「でも沙都子ちゃんの花火ってのもいいよね。@k@vS19/02/990200484.梨花ちゃんの蚊取り線香ってのも、季語みたいでとってもいいと思うよ」
Main.TextENG: ``But Satoko's 'Fireworks' was pretty good too.@k@vS19/02/990200484. Rika's 'Mosquito Coil' is a very nice seasonal choice as well.``

Main.TextJPN: 「……どの答えも実に涼やかなのです」
Main.TextENG: ``...All the choices are quite invigorating.``

Main.TextJPN: 「夏休みまでもうすぐだね。@k@vS19/03/990300571.……今年の夏はどうやって過ごすかなぁ」
Main.TextENG: ``It's almost summer break, isn't it.@k@vS19/03/990300571. ...I wonder how we'll spend it this year.``

Main.TextJPN: 夏休みを想起させる涼やかなキーワード…。@k実に心を豊かにさせてくれる。
Main.TextENG: Invigorating words that invoke the image of summer break.@k Certainly things that enrich the soul.

Main.TextJPN: みんなはじき訪れる夏休みに…たくさんの夢を思い描いているようだった…。
Main.TextENG: As everybody approaches the soon-to-come summer break... a plethora of dreams should be etched upon their thoughts...

Main.TextJPN: 「…ところで圭一さんの答えは何ですの？@k@vS19/04/990400244.　早く見せなさいでございますわ」
Main.TextENG: ``...By the way... Keiichi-san, what did you answer?@k@vS19/04/990400244. Hurry up and show us.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、……お、俺のは大した答えじゃ……」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah.... I di-didn't really write down anything that great...``

Main.TextJPN: 「ダメダメ！@k@vS19/03/990300573.　見せるのがルールなんだから！！　ほらほら！」
Main.TextENG: ``No no no!@k@vS19/03/990300573. Showing us is part of the rules!! Now come on!``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、やめろよッ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11010.　み、見るなー…ッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah... stop it!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11010. D-Don't look!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 『宿題』
Main.TextENG: ``Homework.``

Main.TextJPN: シンとする。
Main.TextENG: The room went silent.

Main.TextJPN: …特に誰のフォローもない。
Main.TextENG: ...Nobody could really follow up that response.

Main.TextJPN: まるで、俺の無神経な答えが、もうすぐ訪れる楽しい夏休みの夢を汚してしまったことを責めるように……。
Main.TextENG: It's as if my impertinent answer had somehow sullied the wonderful dreams of the coming summer break...

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一くんの夏休みって………楽しくなかったんだね…」
Main.TextENG: ``Keiichi-kun's summer breaks......were never fun, were they...``

Main.TextJPN: 「……大丈夫ですよ。@k@vS19/05/990500115.今年の夏はみんなで過ごしましょうです。@k@vS19/05/990500116.…圭一を独りぼっちにはしませんですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...It's alright.@k@vS19/05/990500115. Let's spend the summer this year with everybody.@k@vS19/05/990500116. ...We won't leave you by your lonesome.``

Main.TextJPN: 梨花ちゃんが俺の頭をなでなでする。
Main.TextENG: Rika-chan gently petted my head.

Main.TextJPN: お、…俺の夏休みって一体……。
Main.TextENG: Wh-what exactly did summer break mean to me...

Main.TextJPN: …夏期講習。
Main.TextENG: ...Summer courses.

Main.TextJPN: ひまわりの観察。
Main.TextENG: Observing sunflowers.

Main.TextJPN: 模擬テスト。
Main.TextENG: Practice exams.

Main.TextJPN: 夏季特別集中講座…。
Main.TextENG: Special summer focus seminars.

Main.TextJPN: ……暑い夏休みなんて知らない。@kいつもクーラーの効いた塾だったから…。
Main.TextENG: ...I know nothing of hot summers.@k Because I've always been in an air-conditioned cram school...
...Ugh... the tears... they...

Main.TextJPN: 「……圭ちゃんの夏休み、灰色だったんだね…」
Main.TextENG: ``...Kei-chan's summer breaks were always devoid of hopes and dreams, weren't they...``

Main.TextJPN: 「ぅ、ぅわぁあぁああぁあッ！！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11030.　そんな憐れみの目で俺を見るんじゃねぇええぇええぇええッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wa... WaaaaAAaaaaAaaaaaaaAAAaaaaa!!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11030. Don't look at me with such pity in your eyeeeheeeeheeeeeeeeeEEEeeeeeeeeeeeees!!!``

Main.TextJPN: …このシンパシーというゲーム、想像以上に恐ろしいものかもしれないぞ……。
Main.TextENG: ...This game called 'Sympathy' may be more terrifying than I could ever imagine...
``Well, anyhoo!@k@vS19/03/990300576. Rena and I get 2 points each!!@k@vS19/03/990300577. Let's keep going!! ...Next is... 'Fish'!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 魚か！@k　そう言えば最近、お寿司を食ってないなぁ。
Main.TextENG: So, it's ``Fish``!@k Come to think about it, I haven't eaten sushi in a while.

Main.TextJPN: ちなみに俺は、赤身のマグロよりはヒラメなどを好む『通』なのだったりする！
Main.TextENG: By the way, rather than lean tuna, I'm quite the connoisseur on things like flounder!

Main.TextJPN: …今度の答えは誰かと合うだろう。
Main.TextENG: ...I wonder who I'll match with this answer.

Main.TextJPN: 日本人なら誰だって思いつく答えだからな。
Main.TextENG: Because for a Japanese person, anyone would think of this.

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃ、いいかみんな！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11050.　今度は俺から公開するぜ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11060.　いっせーのーせ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Alright, everybody!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11050. This time we'll start from mine!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11060. Ready, go!!``

Main.TextJPN: 『お寿司』
Main.TextENG: ``Sushi.``

Main.TextJPN: どうだよ今度こそ！
Main.TextENG: How about that for an answer!

Main.TextJPN: 活きのいい魚があったら、焼いたり蒸したりしたいとは思うまい？！
Main.TextENG: When you see a lively fish, do you want to steam it or grill it?

Main.TextJPN: 新鮮な刺身こそ最上！
Main.TextENG: No, to have fresh sashimi is the epitome of cuisine!

Main.TextJPN: そこであえて刺身と書かずお寿司というフレンドリーな単語にすり替えるあたりが俺の狡猾さ…！！
Main.TextENG: Rather than write ``sashimi,`` however, I'll choose the more amiable term in ``sushi`` - That is my cunning ploy!!

Main.TextJPN: ……だが、俺の自信満々の答えとは裏腹に、みんなの表情は淡白だ。
Main.TextENG: ...But contrary to the intrepid resolve of my reply, everybody's expression was listless.
``Oh. That's right...@k@vS19/02/990200487. When you say 'Fish'... ...I see.@k@vS19/02/990200488. ...Sushi is tasty, isn't it.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ぅ、ぅわあぁあぁあぁあ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11080.　そんな同情っぽく言うなぁあぁああ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wa-aaaaaaAAAAAaaaaaaaaaaaa!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11080. Stop talking to me in that consoling toooooooooone!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃあ残る全員も公開するよ？@k@vS19/03/990300579.　いっせーの！」
Main.TextENG: ``Well then, should the rest of us show our answers?@k@vS19/03/990300579. Ready, go!``

Main.TextJPN: 「水族館」@r@t「イルカ」@r@t「クジラ」@r@t「水族館」
Main.TextENG: ``Dolphin.``@r@t``Whale.``@r@t``Aquarium.``@r@t``Aquarium.``

Main.TextJPN: 「梨花と同じ答えですわね！@k@vS19/04/990400247.　２点獲得ですわー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Rika and I have the same answer!@k@vS19/04/990400247. That's 2 points!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「レナはクジラかぁ！@k@vS19/03/990300582.　私も考えたんだけどね。@k@vS19/03/990300583.イルカにしちゃった」
Main.TextENG: ``Rena picked whale, eh?@k@vS19/03/990300582. I thought about that too,@k@vS19/03/990300583. but I ended up picking dolphin.``

Main.TextJPN: 「あ、そうだったの？！@k@vS19/02/990200491.　レナは最初はイルカって書いたんだけど…誰も書かないかなって思って…」
Main.TextENG: ``Ah, really!?@k@vS19/02/990200491. Rena wanted to write dolphin at first... but Rena didn't think anybody else would write it...``

Main.TextJPN: 「……どちらもとってもかぁいいのですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``...Either one of them is very kyute.``

Main.TextJPN: 俺以外の４人は水平線の彼方に思いを馳せ、その耳には潮騒が聞こえているようだった……。
Main.TextENG: Everybody, excluding me, stopped and stared blankly as their thoughts drifted over the horizon. It seems as if they can hear the roar of the open sea from over there...

Main.TextJPN: 「これで全員２点獲得ですわね！@k@vS19/04/990400249.　圭一さん以外！」
Main.TextENG: ``This means everybody has 2 points!@k@vS19/04/990400249. Well... everybody but Keiichi-san!``

Main.TextJPN: 「…圭一くんの答え…、０点だけど、…レナはとっても独創的で面白いと思うな！　思うな！」
Main.TextENG: ``...Keiichi-kun's answers... were worth 0 points, ...but Rena thinks they were very unique and interesting! Interesting!``

Main.TextJPN: 「魚と聞いて真っ先に食用に走るとは。@k@vS19/03/990300585.……圭ちゃん、心の貧しさを恥じた方がいいよ、うん」
Main.TextENG: ``To immediately think of food when you hear the word fish.@k@vS19/03/990300585. ...Kei-chan, you should really be ashamed of how destitute your soul is, huh.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ぅわあぁああぁあぁ～！！」
Main.TextENG: ``WaaaAAAaaaaaaaaaaaAAaaaaa!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「心が貧しいとか言うなぁあぁあぁあッ！！　大体、魅音とレナの答えは何だよ！　魚類じゃないぞそれ！　哺乳類だしッ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Don't say something like my soul is destituuuuuuuuUUuuuuuuuuuute!! Besides, what's with Mion and Rena's answers, anyways! Those aren't even fish! Those are mammals!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「全会一致で却下！！　……ほれ！@k@vS19/03/990300587.　次の問題行くよ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Objection overruled!!@k@vS19/03/990300587. Next!!``

Main.TextJPN: な、なんて嫌なゲームなんだよ今日のは！！
Main.TextENG: Wh-What a horrid game this is today!!

Main.TextJPN: ゲームを重ねれば重ねるほど…自分がいかに安っぽい人間かさらけ出しているようだー！！
Main.TextENG: As the games pile on and on, it seems as if I will be further exposed as a petty human being!!

Main.TextJPN: 俺だけまだ無得点…！！@k　せめて次の問題でくらい得点を取りたいッ！！
Main.TextENG: I'm the only one who still hasn't earned any points!!@k I want to at least get a point in the next round!!

Main.TextJPN: 「さぁてお次のお題目は…………『さくら』！」
Main.TextENG: ``Alright, the next topic is... 'Sakura'!``

Main.TextJPN: ちくしょー！！@k　今度こそ当てるぞー！！
Main.TextENG: Dammit!!@k This time I'll do it!!

Main.TextJPN: クールになれ前原圭一！
Main.TextENG: Keep your cool, Keiichi Maebara!

Main.TextJPN: 自分のセンスで考えるな！
Main.TextENG: Don't think what you would normally think!

Main.TextJPN: 周りは全員女の子なんだぞ？
Main.TextENG: Everybody else here is a girl!

Main.TextJPN: 男のセンスで考えるのはやめるんだ！！
Main.TextENG: Stop thinking like a man!!

Main.TextJPN: ここで『さくら餅』なんて答えを書いたら二の舞になる！
Main.TextENG: If you write down ``Sakura Mochi`` here you'll only be repeating the tragedies of the past!

Main.TextJPN: そういう食い意地の張った男のセンスは捨てるんだ！
Main.TextENG: Throw away that gastrocentric male sensibility!

Main.TextJPN: 今だけ自分を女だと思いこめ！
Main.TextENG: Just for now think of yourself as a girl!

Main.TextJPN: 俺は女…俺は女…俺は女……！！！
Main.TextENG: You are a girl... You are a girl... I am a girl...!!!
``Everybody finished writing!?@k@vS19/03/990300590. Let's do it!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一さん、今度くらい得点できないとヤバいではございませんの～？」
Main.TextENG: ``Keiichi-san, if you don't start getting points right now, won't it be a bit dangerous～?``

Main.TextJPN: ふん！@k　今度こそ完璧だ。@k見事に自分を殺した！！
Main.TextENG: Hmph!@k This time it's perfect.@k I've completely suppressed my own instincts.

Main.TextJPN: 今度こそ…当たるッ！@k　いや、当てるッ！！！
Main.TextENG: This time... I will have a match!@k No, I will *make* it match!!!

Main.TextJPN: 「圭一くん、今度は自信たっぷりだね！@k@vS19/02/990200494.　レナね、今度は圭一くんと合うようにね、男の子の身になって考えたんだよ。@k@vS19/02/990200495.えへへ～…『さくら餅』☆」
Main.TextENG: ``Keiichi-kun, you seem pretty confident about this one!@k@vS19/02/990200494. You see this time, Rena thought like a boy so I could match up with your answer.@k@vS19/02/990200495. Ehehe～... 'Sakura Mochi'☆``

Main.TextJPN: 「……ボクも大好きなのです。@k@vS19/05/990500120.書きましたですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``... I like them too.@k@vS19/05/990500120. I wrote it down.``

Main.TextJPN: レナと梨花ちゃんが二人でえへへ～と笑い合う。
Main.TextENG: Rena and Rika giggled together.

Main.TextJPN: 「ぅおおぉおぉおお！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``WhooOOOOOooooaaaaaaahh!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「今頃になって食い気を出すんじゃねぇえぇえッ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Now is not the time to think with your stomach!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「では圭一さんは私と同じではございませんこと？　『お花見』ですのよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Well then, did Keiichi-san write the same answer as me? I put down 'Hanami'!``

Main.TextJPN: 「そーだよねー！@k@vS19/03/990300592.　さくらって言ったらお花見しかないでしょ！@k@vS19/03/990300593.　私も書いたよ！」
Main.TextENG: ``That's riiiight!@k@vS19/03/990300592. When you say 'Sakura' it just has to be 'Hanami,' yeah?@k@vS19/03/990300593. I wrote that down too!``

Main.TextJPN: 魅音と沙都子の答えは『お花見』！　…お、お花見だとぉおぉおおッ？！？！
Main.TextENG: Mion and Satoko's response was 'Hanami'! 'Hanami,' seriously!?!?

Main.TextJPN: 「お、お、お花見なんて、酒盛りして痴態をさらすオヤジイベントの定番だろうがぁあぁあぁぁッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Th-Th-That's the kind of event where old geezers getting drunk and doing all sorts of depraved things is the standard, isn't iiiiiiitttt!!!

Main.TextJPN: 「何で今頃になってあっさり女の子な答えを放棄するんだよぉおぉッ！！」
Main.TextENG: And why of all times did you just decide to abandon answering from a girl's point of view!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「じゃ何、圭ちゃん。@k@vS19/03/990300595.…あんた、どんな女の子な答えを書いたわけよ」
Main.TextENG: ``Well then, Kei-chan.@k@vS19/03/990300595. ...What sort of girly response did YOU write down?``

Main.TextJPN: 「なな、…何でもないよ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11160.　次行こう次ッ！！　………あ、」
Main.TextENG: ``I-I-It's nothing!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11160. Let's move on to this next topic, moving o-- ...Ah.``

Main.TextJPN: いつの間にか、梨花ちゃんが後ろに回りこんで、背中に隠したメモをじーっと読んでいた。
Main.TextENG: Before I knew it, Rika-chan had circled behind me and was intently reading the memo I had hidden behind my back.

Main.TextJPN: 「………『魔法少女』って書いてありますです」
Main.TextENG: ``...'Magical Girl.'``

Main.TextJPN: …水を打ったような静寂が教室を包む。
Main.TextENG: The abrupt silence enveloped the room.

Main.TextJPN: …公開した紙を見て、他の連中も何も言わない。……いや、言えないのか？
Main.TextENG: Looking at the paper, no one wants to say a word... Or they are at a loss of words?

Main.TextJPN: 誰か笑うとかつっこむとかボケるとかすればいいのに…、誰もリアクションしない。
Main.TextENG: It would be fine if somebody at least laughed at me or played it off as something dumb... but nobody even flinched.

Main.TextJPN: 自分の顔が青から赤に変わり、とうとう腹の底の圧力釜が一気に爆発した。
Main.TextENG: The feeling in the pit of my stomach reached critical mass, causing my once blood-drained face to flush with a sudden wave of heat.

Main.TextJPN: 「さ、ささッ、@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11370.さくらって言ったら魔法少女デフォのカラーだろうがぁぁあぁっ！」
Main.TextENG: ``Sa... Sa-Sa...@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11370.  Sa-kura is the default color of Magical Girl!``

Main.TextJPN: 「ほら、ピンクの髪とか、服とか！　フリフリのレースとかステッキだってピンクだろ？　俺だって知ってるぐらいなんだからぁああぁあぁあッ！！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Look, pink hair, clothes, and the like! Even their laces are pink, right! This is common knowledge!!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……いやそんな、力説しなくてもよく知ってるよ。@k@vS19/03/660300276.最近テレビで可愛いのやってるよね？@k@vS19/03/660300277.　うん。知ってる知ってる」
Main.TextENG: ``...Um yeah, even without the forced explanation, I know about it.@k@vS19/03/660300276. It's that thingy where a girl fights in a different costume every week, right?@k@vS19/03/660300277.  Yeah. I know, I know.``

Main.TextJPN: 「うんうん。とってもかぁいいんだよね！@k@vS19/02/660200318.　レナもテレビで毎週見てるよ。@k@vS19/02/660200319.友達の女の子たちとのやり取りが面白いよね～」
Main.TextENG: ``Yup, yup. She is very cute!@k@vS19/02/660200318. Rena also watches her in TV every week.@k@vS19/02/660200319. It's interesting to see her interacting with friends～``

Main.TextJPN: 「そ、そうですわね。@k@vS19/04/660400135.ペットの猫も、個性的な喋り方でツッコミのたびに笑えますわ！」
Main.TextENG: ``I-Indeed.@k@vS19/04/660400135. The pet cat is also funny at every tsukkomi with its unique way of speaking!``

Main.TextJPN: 「……あれは猫ではなくて虎なのですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``It's not a cat, it's a tiger.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ち、小さければどっちでも一緒ですわっ！」
Main.TextENG: ``What's the difference if it's small!``

Main.TextJPN: 「まあ、それはいいんだけどさ、“さくら”って聞いて発想がそっちに行っちゃうってのは……」
Main.TextENG: ``That aside, it's just a bit surprising that's the first thing you think of when you hear 'Sakura'...``

Main.TextJPN: 「な、なんでだよおおお！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11400.　女の立場になって考えてみただけだろおおおお！」
Main.TextENG: ``Wh-whaaaat?@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11400. I was just thinking from a ladies perspective!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「桜色といえば魔法少女！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11420.　そう考えるのが正しいんだよぉおおおぉおぉおーー…ッ！！@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11430.　そうじゃなきゃダメなんだよぉおおおぉおぉおーー…ッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``About sakura magical girl!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11420.  It's right to think thaaaaaaat!!@k@vS19/01/HR_KEI11430. That's how it has to beeeeeeeee!!``

Main.TextJPN: ぽん。
Main.TextENG: *poomph*

Main.TextJPN: 無言で魅音が肩を叩く。
Main.TextENG: Mion quietly put her hand on my shoulder.

Main.TextJPN: 「圭ちゃん。@k@vS19/03/990300601.……今、確信したわ。@k@vS19/03/990300602.…圭ちゃんは骨の髄まで……オヤジなんだよ。@k@vS19/03/990300603.矯正不能なくらい」
Main.TextENG: ``Kei-chan.@k@vS19/03/990300601. ...Now I am certain.@k@vS19/03/990300602. ...Kei-chan, you are to your very core... A geezer.@k@vS19/03/990300603. Irrevocably so.``

Main.TextJPN: 「ぎゃあぁあぁぁあぁああッ！！」
Main.TextENG: ``GyaaaaaaaaAAAaaaaaAAA!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「何でみんなそんな同情的な目でみるんだぁあぁあああぁあぁあ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Why is everybody looking at me with those eyes filled with piittttttyyyyyyyyy!!!``
``Th-That's not true, Keiichi-kun...@k@vS19/02/990200500. Ok!@k@vS19/02/990200501. Let's do our best!@k@vS19/02/990200502. Here's where the comeback begins!``

Main.TextJPN: 「オヤジな圭一さんに逆転などありえませんわー！！@k@vS19/04/990400256.　大人しく今日の罰ゲームをお食らいなさいませー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``There's no coming back for Keiichi-san the geezer!!@k@vS19/04/990400256. Now give up quietly and accept your penalty!!``

Main.TextJPN: きょ、今日の罰ゲームって…な、何だったっけ…？！
Main.TextENG: Wh-What was today's penalty game again... !?

Main.TextJPN: 「……メイドさん衣装、カチューシャ、ニーソックス付きで１位の人の荷物を運ぶのですよ」
Main.TextENG: ``Dressing up as a maid, complete with hairband and garter belt, while carrying around the winner's stuff.``

Main.TextJPN: 「のわあああぁあぁあぁああぁああッ！！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Nuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuuu!!!``

Main.TextJPN: 「さぁ！！@k@vS19/03/990300605.　我が部の部員なら、この絶対不利を覆してごらんッ！！@k@vS19/03/990300606.　さぁさぁ続けて行くよーー！！」
Main.TextENG: ``Alright!!@k@vS19/03/990300605. If you're real members of this club, show me you won't let anybody come back from this disadvantage!!@k@vS19/03/990300606. Alright, alright, let's keep it rolling!!``
